root: ^I injured my arm at school. What do I do?
^I'll take care of it when I get home
^Make a fuss about it to get the right to skip school

res1: ^The professional medical aid really helped me recover
^I injured my arm and applied to the school nurse. The professional medical aid really helped me recover.
res2: ^The wound got infected, and I nearly died. Now, my arm is working badly
^I injured my arm but decided not to do anything with it. The wound got infected, and I nearly died. Now, my arm is working badly.
res3: ^The wound took a long time to heal and left an ugly scar
^I injured my arm and and treated the wound myself.  It took a long time to heal and left an ugly scar.
res4: ^They cracked my fraud and shamed me. I'm considering changing schools
^I injured my arm and pretended to be seriously ill to be able to skip school.But they cracked my fraud and shamed me.
